thread.title: Trump vs Arnold: Your Apprentice ratings suck. You voted Kasich & Hillary. Here’s Schwarzenegger’s truly American response.
thread.title_full: Trump vs Arnold: Your Apprentice ratings suck. You voted Kasich & Hillary. Here’s Schwarzenegger’s truly American response.

author: Waylon Lewis
title: Trump vs Arnold: Your Apprentice ratings suck. You voted Kasich & Hillary. Here’s Schwarzenegger’s truly American response.
text:
get elephant's newsletter 
I’m no Trump fan. He swims in lies to such an extent that he makes “conventional” politicians look lily-white by comparison. He degrades the office of the Presidency, and I don’t say that as a “libtard,” but as a patriotic American. So it’s…nice to see this cowardly bully get a reminder of what America’s about from a truly tough guy (and fellow conservative). 
For more good times, this from recently: Trump vs SNL: “It is a totally one-sided, biased show.” Here’s Alec Baldwin’s response. 
Trump, continuing to degrade our country, offered the usual bluster: 
“Arnold Schwarzenegger got ‘swamped’ (or destroyed) by comparison to the ratings machine, DJT,” Trump tweeted, referring to himself in the third person. “So much for … being a movie star-and that was season 1 compared to season 14. Now compare him to my season 1. But who cares, he supported Kasich & Hillary.” Wow, the ratings are in and Arnold Schwarzenegger got “swamped” (or destroyed) by comparison to the ratings machine, DJT. So much for…. 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 6, 2017 being a movie star-and that was season 1 compared to season 14. Now compare him to my season 1. But who cares, he supported Kasich & Hillary 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 6, 2017 
Arnold quickly replied to Trump’s tweetrums, with this: There’s nothing more important than the people’s work, @realDonaldTrump . https://t.co/fYtAfFPMKF 
— Arnold (@Schwarzenegger) January 6, 2017 
Then: I wish you the best of luck and I hope you’ll work for ALL of the American people as aggressively as you worked for your ratings. 
— Arnold (@Schwarzenegger) January 6, 2017 
Then, a good reminder for liberals, moderate conservatives and Trump fans alike: Please study this quote from Lincoln’s inaugural, @realDonaldTrump . It inspired me every day I was Governor, and I hope it inspires you. pic.twitter.com/QRoOFTZfQ9 
— Arnold (@Schwarzenegger) January 6, 2017 
We are not enemies. We are all Americans. 
Arnold, whatever his pluses and minuses, clearly gets what America is truly about. Imagine Trump saying these words. Feeling these feelings. Reacting in this way. You can’t: 
Relephant bonus from elephant: 5,311 views hot on elephant
